metering: Yes, Matrix, Center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), Spot (digital zoom 2X or more)
memorycardtype: SD memory card, SDHC memory card, SDXC memory card
shootingmodes: Auto, Scene (Scene auto selector, Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and white copy, Backlighting, Panorama assist, Pet portrait), Special effects, Smart portrait
digitalzoom: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of 728mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
display: 2.7 inch TFT LCD with 5-level brightness adjustment
